ComicInfo.Summary:
1. "Out of the mists of history" (13 pages) - Featuring Samson and David
2. "Octo, the planet of the octopus men" (6 pages) - Featuring Flip Falcon
3. "Space Smith and Diana" (6 pages) - Featuring Space Smith by "Hank Christy"
4. "Yank Wilson, known as Q4" (6 pages) - Featuring Yank Wilson by Dennis Neville
5. "Like a whirlwind of living terror" " (8 pages) - Featuring Black Fury by Dennis Neville
6. H. M. Mystery Ship (2 pages) by Nathaniel Nitkin
7. "Captain Kidd, adventurer and explorer" (5 pages) - Featuring Captain Kidd
8. "Kingdom on the moon" (8 pages) - Featuring Golden Knight by Grieg Chapian
9. "M-mm! Things are pretty quiet tonight!" (7 pages) - Featuring Sub Saunders by Henry Kiefer
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 18:11:51. [Issue ID 1354]
